name: Cannibals!
description:
Cannibals! is a prototype first-person shooter survival game for Windows.

Explore the area, kills some cannibals and 10 to 50 feral hogs!

Minimum system requirements

Operating System: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higher

CPU: Intel Core i3-4170 or better

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or better

HDD: 1.37 GB free space

RAM: 8 GB

VRAM: 6 GB
